attributes.title: Disgusting🤡
attributes.review: When I opened this app, my phone immediately shut down. I’m talking will not turn on, except the only thing on my screen was the words TRUMP 2020. Odd. I restarted my phone and opened it again. Same thing! Long story short I did this for a while and then the Cheeto himself called me and told me to stop. 0/10 worthless app.

attributes.title: from trumps 🧚🏻‍♂️supporting🧚🏻‍♂️ mexicans
attributes.review:
i heard this guy loves🥰to talk about my people and he was giving us so much ✨love and attention✨ so i wanted to see what this croissant was about, i assure you to the supporters that this is a compliment🥰. when i downloaded this app it wanted to know everything about me including a picture of me and my address and when i answered the questions people started breaking down my door. i ran so fast that i forgot to turn of my tamales that were still on the stove as i am now writing this i am hiding in my attic. wish me luck.    
                ~ juan🇲🇽
👁👄👁
     🙏🏽

I downloaded the app one stormy night cause why not, well right when I opened the app I got a bunch of questions like their trying to find out where I live and now I’m scared for me and my family and I got on the main screen and saw three oranges they looked moldy I think they should really fix this app.....

attributes.title: This app called me a disgrace and spit on me😭😭
attributes.review: I got this app so I could see what the Head Cheeto was going to do for his new candidacy. When I opened it, an alarm started going off about how a semi-homosexual was intruding the app! Then, a team came to my house saying I needed to be converted and took me to a camp! Now I have trauma from this event, but I still love who I want and listen to Girl in Red😌💅🏻

when i opened the app i was greeted by a cheeto. not only was this a traumatic experience, but i am also allergic to cheetos and if i look at one i am immediately sent into shock. i expect that this app gets taken down immediately so that anyone else that has had a prior traumatic experience with, or is allergic to cheetos does not have the same shock and horror that i had when i opened the app. the side effects of this monstrosity were not made aware when i first saw the app, so if it does not get taken down, more people are going to be traumatized and hurt when they open the app.

attributes.title: 🧚🏿‍♂️🎉Da App🎉🧚🏼

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I wanted to download this app to keep up with my wonderful president but after I did my phone started acting up. I would get random messages and my phone would start to glitch, after that I tried to contact the helpline but nobody ever got back with me. I guess I’ll just have to listen to Fox News for updates.
